title: Gold Buying Frenzy Puts Thai Trading House on Record Trajectory
description: Unprecedented gold prices and a surge in retail sales may push revenue at Thailand’s largest gold trading house to a record 5 trillion baht ($156 billion) this year, according to Hua Seng Heng Chief Executive Officer Tanarat Pasawongs.
content: Unprecedented gold prices and a surge in retail sales may push revenue at Thailand’s largest gold trading house to a record 5 trillion baht ($156 billion) this year, according to Hua Seng Heng Chief Executive Officer Tanarat Pasawongs.
